skill1.description: Luffy pumps blood faster increasing his speed and power. For 3 turns Luffy will take 3 affliction damage*, will have 50% damage reduction, and his skills will deal 5 more damage. During this, if an ally dies then all enemies take 10 damage.
skill1.name: Gomu Gomu no Gatling

skill2.description: Luffy pumps blood faster increasing his speed and power. For 3 turns Luffy will take 3 affliction damage*, will have 50% damage reduction, and his skills will deal 5 more damage. During this, if an ally dies then all enemies take 10 damage.
skill2.name: Gomu Gomu no Gatling

character.name: brook
character.description: Monkey D. Luffy is the grandson of the infamous Admiral Monkey D. Garp. Unlike his grandfather, Luffy didn't become a Marine; his dream is to become the opposite, the Pirate King! In order to do so, he created the Straw Hat Pirates and picks powerful members himself. Even though the Devil Fruit, Gomu Gomu no Mi, that Luffy ate brought him a weakness, he still remains a figure that should not be underestimated, for he has proven his power throughout many battles

skill1.description: Luffy shoots out his arms at high speeds. This deals 25 damage. Below 60 health, this skill will deal half of the damage Luffy has taken. Below 25 health, this skill will cost 1 more random chakra, will deal piercing damage and will have a cooldown of 1.
skill1.name: Gomu Gomu no Pistol

skill2.description: Luffy sends a very strong punch at his enemy dealing 30 piercing damage. For 1 turn if the targeted enemy uses a passive skill, then his passive skills will be stunned. If he uses an offensive skill then his offensive skills will be stunned.
skill2.name: Gomu Gomu no Pistol

skill3.description: Luffy pumps blood faster increasing his speed and power. For 3 turns Luffy will take 3 affliction damage*, will have 50% damage reduction, and his skills will deal 5 more damage. During this, if an ally dies then all enemies take 10 damage.
skill3.name: Gomu Gomu no Gatling

skill4.invulnerable: This skills make Monkey D. Luffy invulnerable for 1 turn.
